column5: Click on my profile to check out my 2 other Downtown Dallas apartments: Another 1-bedroom apartment & a 2-bedrooms apartment  You are looking at an elegant 1-bedroom condo right at the heart of Downtown Dallas. You can certainly walk to almost everything you need from high-end restaurants to parks, shopping, and tourist destinations. It offers a fully equipped kitchen, stainless steel appliances, hardwood flooring, in-home washer and dryer, beautiful pool, fitness center, and sundeck.
